title: BRIEF-Stars Group Acquires Majority Interest In CrownBet For $117.7 Million
text: 20 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Stars Group Acquires Majority Interest In CrownBet For $117.7 Million Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Stars Group Inc: * STARS GROUP ACQUIRES MAJORITY INTEREST IN CROWNBET * STARS GROUP INC - DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY $117.7 MILLION * STARS GROUP INC - ‍UNDER TRANSACTION AGREEMENTS, STARS GROUP IS ALSO ENTITLED TO APPOINT A MAJORITY OF DIRECTORS ON BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF CROWNBET​ * STARS GROUP INC - CO ACQUIRED 62% INTEREST IN CROWNBET FROM CROWN RESORTS LIMITED IN AN ALL-CASH TRANSACTION USING CASH ON STARS GROUP‘S BALANCE SHEET * STARS GROUP INC - NORTHERN TERRITORY RACING COMMISSION HAS APPROVED TRANSACTION SUBJECT TO STARS GROUP SATISFYING CERTAIN STANDARD CONDITIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
